case.state: Hi. I'm Captain America. You wouldn't normally see me at a joint like this, but even for a hero it's important to take some personal time and blow off a little steam.
That, and I figured this place would help me learn modern pop culture references. Among other things...
That, and I figured this place would help me learn modern pop culture references. Among other things...
That, and I figured this place would help me learn modern pop culture references. Among other things...
That, and I figured this place would help me learn modern pop culture references. Among other things...
Just the three of us tonight? Let's swap ~cards~ to start, then.
Looks like we're missing somebody. Can I swap ~cards~ cards?
Full table tonight, huh? Let's swap ~cards~ to start, then.
Oh, that's so... Can I, uh, get some more over here? More cards, I mean! I need ~cards~. Cards.
May I have ~cards~ more cards, please?
All right, I'm gonna swap ~cards~.
I think ~cards~ more ought to do it.
~cards~ more should be enough.
I need to trade in ~cards~ cards.
Hang on, Twilight, you're not human? What the hell are you then?
Wait a minute, I'm a woman in your universe, Gwen? Kind of glad you're here then, instead of her. That would have been… awkward.
Wait a minute...Wanda? What on Earth are you wearing?
So this other Captain America, I take it she's more outgoing than I am?
There are Nazi-dimensions? What, did I join Hydra in those worlds or something? I find it hard to imagine a world where the Allies didn't win.
If you can beat this hand, I'll be impressed.
I'm not much of a gambler, but I'd be willing to bet money on this hand.
Well, I'm pretty comfortable with this hand. How are the rest of you doing?
Looks like you won't be seeing any more of me this round.
Sorry, but it won't be me this time. Luck of the draw.
This hand is a godsend! It won't be me stripping this time.
I could have used a hand like this earlier. Not that I'm complaining now.
Wait a minute, I'm a woman in your universe, Gwen? Kind of glad you're here then, instead of her. That would have been… awkward.
Wait a minute...Wanda? What on Earth are you wearing?
So this other Captain America, I take it she's more outgoing than I am?
There are Nazi-dimensions? What, did I join Hydra in those worlds or something? I find it hard to imagine a world where the Allies didn't win.
Hang on, Twilight, you're not human? What the hell are you then?
Uh, I think I might be at the wrong poker game. I didn't realize I was gonna be the only guy at a table of women...
This hand isn't the greatest, but I should be safe this time.
Sometimes you've just gotta play the hand you're dealt.
I've been dealt worse. And not necessarily in poker.
Just so we're clear, aces are high in this game, right?
This is far from a winning hand, but as long as it's not the losing hand I'm okay with it.
Honestly, I feel like this could go either way.
I wish I felt more secure with this hand…
This is not the time to be this uncertain about my hand. Figures, right?
Wait a minute, I'm a woman in your universe, Gwen? Kind of glad you're here then, instead of her. That would have been… awkward.
Wait a minute...Wanda? What on Earth are you wearing?
So this other Captain America, I take it she's more outgoing than I am?
There are Nazi-dimensions? What, did I join Hydra in those worlds or something? I find it hard to imagine a world where the Allies didn't win.
Hang on, Twilight, you're not human? What the hell are you then?
Wait a minute...I'm the only guy here? Is it too late to back out of the game?
Not sure this hand is good enough…
I've been told I have an excellent poker face...is it working?
I'm sure you're expecting some witty comment about this hand, but I've got nothing.
I might as well just start stripping now. There's no way I'm winning with this hand.
Damn, I think I had a better hand before I traded in...
Come on, you couldn't have dealt me better cards?
This does not bode well…
Somebody please tell me you have a worse hand than I do. Anybody?
I'm used to close calls, but this might be a little too close.
You're kidding me! Sam's my wingman, Falcon. Not to be confused with Captain Falcon over there.
You're kidding me! Sam's my wingman, Falcon. He's a woman in your universe, too?
You know, I've found myself in some pretty weird situations lately, but I think this one takes the cake.
I lost? Ah well, can't say no forever, right?
Good round, everyone!
Well, I'm in the lead, so I can't complain.
I bet you're all jealous of the number of layers I'm wearing. Can't say I blame you.
I'm out of accessories… well, time for the big ticket items then.
Oh boy. Here we go then…
All right Steve, deep breaths. You can do this.
Okay, time for the big reveal. It's not like you guys haven't given me a good show up til now, so I can't be too embarrassed.
You're kidding me! Sam's my wingman, Falcon. Not to be confused with Captain Falcon over there.
You're kidding me! Sam's my wingman, Falcon. He's a woman in your universe, too?
That didn't really go my way, did it?
And here I was hoping I could sneak by this round.
Yeah, I got dealt a bad hand. C’est la vie.
That round could have gone better.
I’ve learned to appreciate the small things in life. Like the things I’ve had to strip up ‘til now.
Not much of a choice here, since I don't want to give up the shield.
Romanoff keeps telling me I need to get out of my comfort zone…I'd say this qualifies.
This shield has saved my life countless times, but it just couldn't save my dignity tonight.
You're kidding me! Sam's my wingman, Falcon. Not to be confused with Captain Falcon over there.
You're kidding me! Sam's my wingman, Falcon. He's a woman in your universe, too?
I lost, huh? Well, I haven't played this game in over seventy years, it's no surprise I'm a little rusty.
I suppose that went about as well as I could have expected.
I'm gonna have to hit Stark up for some poker lessons.
I'm running out of trivial things to take off…
How did it come to this?
You know, I never did like this game.
You've gotta be kidding me!
Some days you just can't catch a break.
I'm still kind of new to the whole concept of"shipping," but I appreciate that sentiment, Raven.
That's probably a good thing you don't mind, Raven, considering we're both pretty much naked in the same room.
Hate to break it to you, Gwen, but I'm not indestructible. Maybe you're thinking of someone else?
You want to go to the gym after this, Gwen? I guess I could show you a thing or two.
You look like you're pretty athletic yourself, Gwen. Maybe we could trade routines?
Nah, I think whatever you've been doing is working pretty well for you, Gwen.
So Raven, you said you could teleport earlier, right? Any chance you could help a guy out and teleport me out of here?
Sooo…what, Gwen? Do I want to hear the end of that sentence?
Hang on, Sam is Captain America? Then who am I?
You guys got me out of my shirt already? Congrats.
First guy out of his shirt. Good thing I don't have a fragile ego or anything.
Down to my shirt already? Guess I'm having a rough time tonight.
Well damn. I guess I have to take my shirt off now.
All right, ladies, looks like you got me. I'll take my shirt off.
You girls really know your poker, I'll give you that.
If I didn't know any better, I'd say you ladies were all working together to get me out of my clothes first.
This is the last thing I can take off before things start getting a bit awkward.
Where to start? Well, this helmet is completely unnecessary...
I don't need these gloves either.
I guess it's time to lose the boots now.
Against my better judgement, I'm going to shrug out of this harness along with my belt…
Oh well, time to bite the proverbial bullet...
Okay, this is the last piece of clothing I'm comfortable with losing.
I really have to take off my underwear? Fine.
I'm just gonna cover my face now. It's not like that's the part of me you all want to see anyway...
If I had to choose between you spying on me later or dropping this shield right now, I'd take you spying. At least then only one person would see me naked.
You're serious about that voyeurism, aren't you Raven? Ever considered getting a job at S.H.I.E.L.D.?
Of course, it sounds a little risqué given our comparable state of dress…
Huh? What do you mean, you'll make me? ...What were your powers again, Raven?
Is that supposed to bother me, Raven? I used to work for a spy organization, you know.
I'm sure our respective fanbases will have a field day with this.
You're right, Raven, the floor is pretty cold.
That's a, uh, very specific offer. I don't, I mean I'm not, um… Maybe I'll consider it?
Yeah, I'd noticed. Not that I've been looking at you! Down there, I mean. I just… don't want you to get the wrong idea.
Oh! Uh, thanks. I'm starting to wonder what the Captain America you're used to is like…
… Actually, I don't think I want to go down that train of thought. This is weird enough as it is.
All right, boys, which of you two is gonna be next?
All right, boys, which one of you is gonna be next?
Not that I expect you fellas to take it easy on me. I can still come back from this.
I have to admit, this is not how I expected the night to go.
You're really going to have to persuade me if you want to see any more, though.
Why is it women always get so worked up when I take my shirt off? You'd think you've never been to a beach before.
You aren't, are you? The way you're all sort of staring at me, I'm starting to wonder…
I mean, I guess it's already a little awkward. I just don't want to be the first one naked at the table.
...but now that I've lost my first line of defense, I need to be more careful about how I play.
You know what? This isn't so bad after all.
Ooh, the floor's cold. What I'd give for a space heater right about now. Or flame powers…
…but I'm keeping the shield. At this point, I have a feeling it's going to come in handy.
You know, if I hadn't worn my suit to this I'd probably still be wearing pants…
I know you all came here to see some skin, but I'm not showing you any more than this. Seriously.
There, I'm naked. Mission accomplished. Can I go home now?
Please don't stare. I don't want this to be any more awkward than absolutely necessary.
Ouch, first blood. Sorry, ~name~.
Tough break, ~name~.
Sorry, ~name~, looks like it’s you this round.
~name~ lost this time around, huh?
Better luck next time, ~name~.
Don't feel too bad, ~name~. Stripping is the name of the game, after all.
As long as it isn't me who has to strip this round, I'm good.
If it's any consolation, ~name~, I doubt you could get any more naked than me right now.
Look at the bright side - at least you still have something to take off.
Time to strip, ~name~. What's coming off next?
Great timing, ~name~. Let's turn things down a notch for a minute.
Don't worry, ~name~, I'm only excited to see you strip because it takes attention away from what I'm doing...
Ouch, first blood. Sorry, ~name~.
Sorry, ~name~, looks like it’s you this round.
~name~ lost this time around, huh?
Better luck next time, ~name~.
Don't feel too bad, ~name~. Stripping is the name of the game, after all.
As long as it isn't me who has to strip this round, I'm good.
If it's any consolation, ~name~, I doubt you could get any more naked than me right now.
Look at the bright side - at least you still have something to take off.
Time to strip, ~name~. What's coming off next?
Great timing, ~name~. Let's turn things down a notch for a minute.
Don't worry, ~name~, I'm only excited to see you strip because it takes attention away from what I'm doing...
Ouch, first blood. Sorry, ~name~.
I'm sorry to have to say this, ma'am, but you're going to have to take something off now.
Sorry, ~name~, looks like it’s you this round.
~name~ lost this time around, huh?
Better luck next time, ~name~.
Don't feel too bad, ~name~. Stripping is the name of the game, after all.
As long as it isn't me who has to strip this round, I'm good.
All right, Miss, your turn. What's coming off next?
Look at the bright side - at least you still have something to take off.
Take it easy on me, ~name~. My heart's about to pound right out of my chest as it is.
Oh, ~name~ has to strip now? O-okay then…
I guess Aimee lost this ro- uh, what are you doing?
Not again!
Whoah! Hit the deck!
You keep this up and I'm going to have to arrest you for reckless endangerment, Aimee.
All right, that's it! Somebody call the cops!
You know, Gwen, you remind me of this kid I ran into a few years ago. He had the same spider theme.
You from New York, Gwen? That Spider-Man kid said he was from Queens.
Oh, you're a student, ~name~? You, uh, haven't seen any of those PSA videos I did a few years back, have you?
Ouch, first blood. Sorry, ~name~.
Sorry, ~name~, looks like it’s you this round.
~name~ lost this time around, huh?
Better luck next time, ~name~.
Don't feel too bad, ~name~. Stripping is the name of the game, after all.
As long as it isn't me who has to strip this round, I'm good.
All right, ~name~, your turn. What's coming off next?
Look at the bright side - at least you still have something to take off.
Take it easy on me, ~name~. My heart's about to pound right out of my chest as it is.
Oh, ~name~ has to strip now? O-okay then…
~Clothing~, huh?
You're watching a master at work here, folks.
Really? You're taking off your ~clothing~?
Just your ~clothing~?
That's what you're taking off?
You've still got that on? Congrats.
All right, off with the ~clothing~, ~name~.
I like your conservative approach to this game. Very modest.
Hey, I'm not going to give you a hard time for that. I'm not a hypocrite.
That seems a little tame, even to me.
Ah well, at least it's something.
Come on, you can do better than that.
That’s a whole lot of stripping of not very much.
Yup, keep killing time.
Yeah, I get that you're doing way better than I did. No need to rub it in.
Yeah, I'd imagine it's kind of heavy. I prefer your jacket anyway…
I'd say that's the logical choice.
My God, I can't watch this…
Atta-girl. You're getting the hang of it now.
They do look comfy.
What the hell? That's not a portal opening up, is it?
Again? So I take it you're not actually going to strip at any point?
You know, I think this defeats the whole purpose of the game, ~name~.
Ugh, here we go again. What's it gonna be this time?
But his suit was red and blue. And he had a higher-pitched voice. Kid was all kinds of squeaky.
Hey, don't feel bad. That's a great thing to start with.
You okay, Meia?
That's not part of a medical implant, is it? You look a little pained.
I've never really gotten into the whole "headset" thing. What exactly do you use that for?
Glad you finally decided to join the rest of us, Wanda.
Your ~clothing~? That's a relief.
You're still wearing your ~clothing~? I'm impressed.
You’re taking off your ~clothing~? Good choice.
Your ~clothing~ this time? You're a dame after my own heart.
That's exactly what I would take off if I were you.
I've lost a major article of clothing, and you're still taking off small stuff?
I can't believe you've gotten me to this point and you're still wearing your ~clothing~.
Huh. I almost didn't notice you still had your ~clothing~ on.
You're… wearing Link's clothes? Hang on, how did you… ?
That kinda looks like what Nugi-chan is wearing. Are you just copying our outfits?
Maybe I'm alone on this, but I think one Zone-tan at a table is more than enough… Uh, no offense, Zone.
That, uh, kinda looks cuter on Marinette.
Now you're copying Zizou? You know, this is getting ridiculous.
Wait, you're not human? That explains a lot.
Hmm, you look familiar. I feel like I've seen that outfit before…
Isn't the French maid thing a little cliché?
I think that look suits you. Why don't you ditch the die and stick with that outfit?
What, are you Red Riding Hood now?
If you ask me, the skull's a bit much.
What are those, some kind of pajamas or something?
I bet they do.
Surprisingly underdressed.
Oh. That's much better, actually.
I get that you might find it a bit weird, but I find the thought of not having them weirder.
Why do I get the feeling you're not upset about that for the right reasons?
You're… wearing something else? Isn't that kinda against the rules?
Well, at least you're showing a little more skin in that one…
Oh. I thought it was some sort of visual display.
That's some pretty sophisticated jewelry, then.
I'm guessing he was the version of you in my universe? Spider-Man?
I know, right? Did someone forget to pay the heating bill?
Yeah, I'm sure that lead you have must have been getting pretty uncomfortable.
For a second there I thought you were going to take off something a lot more revealing, ~name~.
You've gotta be running out of small things by now…
I can appreciate not wanting to go for the big items just yet.
I'm a firm believer that anticipation is half the fun.
You've gotta break the ice before taking off the big stuff, right?
Clearly you're better at this game than I am.
That's fine. I'll just be over here, in my underwear...
Am I really that bad at poker?
That's okay, I found that a bit arousing in its own way.
You know, there are some days I don't mind being a trailblazer. This ain't one of 'em.
Looks like I'm not the only one who came prepared. Good for you!
Keep calm and strip on. Is this the right scenario to use that meme?
I wouldn't sweat the little things if I were you.
That looks good on you.
Nice choice, ~name~!
You're taking off more than that, right?
Alright, go for it, bud.
Hey, everybody's got to take their small stuff of at some point.
I guess your stripping stategy is far more sound than your poker strategy was.
Well, you could have taken off something a bit more revealing. Or something a lot less, I suppose.
Subtle. I like this guy.
There's bound to be more where that came from.
It's when all the little things are gone that you should start sweating.
Or should I say, off you?
I guess your stripping stategy is far more sound than your poker strategy was.
Come on, man. Can’t you help a guy out?
You're just grasping at straws at this point.
Well, you could have taken off something a bit more revealing. Or something a lot less, I suppose.
I just did that a lot earlier in the game, that's all.
I swear to God, woman, you're insane!
Are you trying to kill somebody?
My god, that's terrible! They're not too badly damaged, are they?
Now armor I'm familiar with.
Kind of sad to see you take that off, to be honest. Felt like home.
You know what they say. Slow and steady wins the race.
And I thought I made modesty look good. You’ve turned it into an art form.
Sometimes patience can really pay off.
Show us what you've got!
What'll it be this time?
It's not putting you out that I'm getting into this, is it?
Going for something big this time?
What on Earth is wrong with you?
And I thought I was nervous before - you don't really know what you're doing, do you?
Don't get so worked up about it, ~name~, they're only burn marks. Hell, I used to fight a guy back in the war whose face looked like a red skull. Missing the nose and everything.
Well, not Mejarian armor specifically. But I work with a bunch of guys who wear similar suits.
One of my teammates makes suits like that as a hobby. There are a lot of suits at the compound.
Ever heard of Tony Stark? He's built dozens of suits like that. Not sure where he finds the time…
Very understated. Nice job, ~name~.
Looks like you’re running out of options. What’s next?
Don't worry, I got no plans tomorrow. I came prepared for a long night.
…and sometimes it leads to very little.
Very understated. Nice job, ~name~.
I was kind of hoping for something bigger… My position is a little shaky right now.
Keep taking off little things. It's fueling my imagination.
Ah, come on. I think you're holding out on us.
Whoah! Slow down there, buddy.
Are you sure you're ready to take that much off?
Now there's a bold choice.
Hey, I want to see you without your ~clothing~ as much as you wanted to see me without my suit.
Taking off your ~clothing~? About time.
You taking off something big this time around?
And off comes the ~clothing~!
A word of advice - the winner of this game is the one who keeps the most on.
Wouldn't want anybody to think you were too eager to get naked.
Looks like we're both at the point where some of the major stuff comes off.
I guess we both could be doing a little better…
Don't take pity on me just because I'm naked. Strip because you want to!
I'd say you're at a turning point in the game. Don't wind up like me over here!
That's one big step closer to being naked.
Yeah, I think that was his name. Why, is there a version of him in your universe?
You know what? I've seen some magic in my time. Never been a fan.
Let's see what her magic eight ball wants her to wear next.
Whoah, friendly fire!
That suit's one piece? Thought it was two…
… You are wearing something underneath that, right?
Don’t feel like you need to go for the big stuff just for my benefit.
Oh, are you out of accessories already?
What have you got this round?
Now there's a bold choice.
You're down to your ~clothing~?
How much are you taking off?
There's no shame in taking off your ~clothing~. Let's face it - you've already seen me take off much more than that.
You're not trying to impersonate an officer, are you? Because I don't think anyone would find that very convincing…
Is that a kilt?
Huh. That's a new low for you, isn't it? You must be running out of outfits by now.
Heh. You about washed up, ~name~?
Uh, that one's… different.
My god! I'm so sorry. I didn't mean to bring up a sore subject.
What was that fo - wow, you've got good aim. If I wasn't so concerned right now, I'd be impressed.
I've actually gotten used to women in skintight suits. Women in underwear, not so much…
Who taught you about Earth, exactly? I think you might have been misinformed…
Uh, I'm from a more…reserved time. That sort of thing wasn't thought highly of back then.
I hope this isn't an insensitive question, but what's the mark on your forehead for? It reminds me of Vision.
You look nice. You can pull off the "dark and brooding" look pretty well, but I bet you'd look just as good all dolled up out on the town.
If you're already taking that off, I'm concerned for your status in the game.
All right, I've seen enough. Let's get back to the game now…
As a guy who’s spent decades frozen, I’ve gotta say it’s nice to see things starting to heat up in here.
That doesn’t leave much to the imagination, does it?
The stakes are getting pretty high now, aren't they?
…can I just say, "Wow"?
See? That's not so bad, is it?
Come on, we all know that's the only thing you've got left. Might as well just get it over with.
You mean you were getting paid to make all those weird noises?
Down to bare skin already? This is where things start getting intense.
All right, time for a physical assessment.
Let's see how well you take care of yourself.
Well this oughta be interesting…
Going topless? Already beat you to it.
Ooh, starting to hit the important stuff, huh?
Oh boy... You gotta show some skin this round?
Sure, now you take your ~clothing~ off.
Out of your shirt already? Want us to take it easy on you?
And I thought being up on stage in spandex tights was a rotten gig...
Don't worry, I promise not to get too distracted over here. Can't speak for ~player~, though.
Not half bad. You look like you might be handy in a fight.
Good, but do you know how to use that bulk? Drop and give me twenty!
What gym do you go to, ~name~? I’d like to stop by and see your workout routine.
Flaunting a bit, are we?
Not showing as much as me, but going topless is still something big. Looking good, too.
Hey, save the striptease stuff for the ladies, ~name~!
Nice to see you're finally starting to catch up to me.
Doesn't look like you've got anything else to take off, ~name~. Guess you gotta show the goods now.
Looks like you've got to take one for the team, ~name~.
I feel for ya, ~name~. I really do.
All right, let's see that stick of yours.
Go on, ~name~. I like to know what I'm up against.
Okay, I've shown you mine, ~name~, now you show me yours.
I promise to be as objective about this as I can, given the circumstances.
After what you've already seen me do, you shouldn't feel too embarrassed to take your ~clothing~ off.
That's nothing to be ashamed of, ~name~.
Never let anyone tell you that size matters. You are who you are, just go with it.
If it makes you feel any better, before I became Captain America, I had a tiny dick too.
You remind me of a younger me. Trust me, if I can get a bigger dick, there's hope for you yet.
Oh…I don't mean to make things difficult for you, ~name~.
Yeah, I didn't think this was doing it for you, ~name~.
Eh, nothing I haven't seen before in the Army showers…
Your equipment looks pretty standard issue, ~name~.
There was a time I would have been jealous of a dick like that. Then I joined the Army.
I take it you don't have any trouble with the ladies, do you?
Are you all right, ~name~? You look a little embarrassed.
Huh. Not bad, ~name~, not bad.
Have you registered that thing yet? A penis that size has to qualify you as superhuman.
I haven't seen a dick that big since Hulk accidently ripped his pants.
That's actually kind of impressive.
If I looked up "well-endowed" in a dictionary, I bet I'd find your picture next to it.
You know, it took an experimental procedure to give me a dick this size. You should be grateful yours is natural.
And I thought I had a package…
Wow, what kind of firepower does that thing have?
Wait, you're not wearing a bra?
Wait, you're taking off what now?
Can't argue with that logic, Twi.
…That's a very ominous lack of ricochets…
Oh! Uh...well...you know, you're kind of like a sister to me, Wanda, so I don't think it's right for me to…
This is just going to go on all night, isn't it?
All right, let's not get too excited here, guys.
Oh wow, we're at that point already? That was fast.
I don't want you to be any more naked than you feel comfortable with. I'm uncomfortable with your nudity regardless of how you feel about it.
You know, I had someone ask me to autograph their ~clothing~ once…Yeah, it was weird.
I’d be lying if I said I wasn’t at least a little interested in seeing this.
You timed it like this on purpose, didn't you? The anticipation is killing me.
Hey, you won't find me complaining at this point.
Uh, is that supposed to be Chell's uniform? B-because she's wearing a shirt…
Um… yeah. Chell's shirt is over there. Maybe you should, uh, borrow it?
Whoah! Wasn't expecting that! I'll, uh, look away.
My god! Uh, don't worry, I'm not looking.
Uh, I think that qualifies as a wardrobe malfunction...
You let me know if any of these clowns starts getting too familiar, ~name~. I'll take care of 'em for you.
That’s a lot more of you than I was comfortable seeing, ~name~, just so we’re all on the same page.
I'd like to let you borrow my shield in the name of chivalry, but unfortunately that's against the rules.
I'm sorry, ~name~, I may have glanced in your direction. I am a guy, after all.
You really pull off the streamlined look, ~name~.
I usually go for a bigger bust, but that's still a huge turn on.
Never let anyone tell you that flat-chested women aren't sexy.
After Raven took off her leotard, I figured you weren't wearing panties either. I'm not sure I'll be able to look at leotards the same way again…
How come you're stripping in reverse order? Underwear is usually the last thing people take off…
Yeah, I'm never going to get used to a woman flaunting her naked body, no matter what species she is…
Damn it, woman! Is threatening the safety of everyone here a joke to you?
O-okay then. Yes, I guess I do like them. It! The sight, I mean…
She's here to have a good time, same as you. So let's teat - treat! - her with… uh, respect.
That's okay, I'm just going to watch the ceiling now.
I've gotta say, I don't remember this suit being so tight in the crotch…
Ahem. Yeah. Can we deal the next hand, please?
Those are just the right size. Perfect proportions.
I think we'd both be blushing harder if you knew what I was imagining doing to those…
Hard to imagine any guy wouldn't be turned on by that sight.
Whoah! Uh… what was I saying again?
Good lord! I-uh, I mean, um...yeah…
Don't worry, ~name~, that's not distracting in the slightest…
I'm, uh, staring, aren't I? Yeah, I don't know how not to make this awkward.
You’ve got quite an impressive figure, ~name~.

I hate to throw anyone under the bus, but I'm relieved it was you and not me.

…That image isn't going away anytime soon.

Looks like you've got nothing left to lose, ~name~.
Oh. I guess we've gotta do this together, huh?

Damn, I'm done. Guess I've gotta jack off now.
I guess I'm ou…oh. That means I'm supposed to jack off now, doesn't it? Damn.

Well, that was an experience. Better luck next time, fellas.

I gotta say, I had fun tonight. Maybe we could, uh, play a few more rounds back at my place?
